Tech.name: Mercy's Touch
Tech.Description: So long as you remain absolutely pacifistic and aid all victims with equal care, your Medicine rolls heal an additional +2k1 Wounds. If you ever forsake the path of absolute pacifism (that is, if you ever voluntarily engage in violence against another creature) you lose this benefit forever. You may not learn any Kiho this Rank.

RequirementOption.text: Replaces: Order of Jurojin's Blessing 4, any pacifist Brotherhood School 4
